language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language of the game.

display_mode.title: Display Mode
display_mode.description: Change the display mode of the game.

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: Change the resolution of the game.

display_frame.title: Display Frame
display_frame.description:
Change the display frame option of the game.

<color=#7eeef3>Synchronization</color> : Limits frames to fit the display.
<color=#7eeef3>Unlimited</color> : Turn off frame limits.
<color=#7eeef3>Custom</color> : Limits frames to a specified number

v_sync.title: V-Sync
v_sync.description:
Synchronizes the refresh rate and frame rate of a monitor

<color=#ff0000><Warning>  The "Display Frame option" may not function properly.</color>

texture_quality.title: Texture Quality
texture_quality.description: Change the texture quality of the game.

anti_aliasing.title: Anti-Aliasing
anti_aliasing.description: Change the anti-aliasing of the game.

bloom.title: Bloom
bloom.description: Change the bloom of the game.

show_frame.title: Show Frame
show_frame.description:
If this option is enabled,
display the frame in the lower right corner.

show_time.title: Show Time
show_time.description:
If this option is enabled,
display the time in the lower left corner.

messages.playtime: It's been {value[0]} since You played Sqare Beat.
